content: the briar cardigan features lovely bobble and lace panels along fronts and sleeves with a back that is simple stockinette made with ultra wool fine this cropped cardigan is light yet warm and of course machine washable **finished measurements** bust with buttonbands overlapped 35½ 38¾ 43 46¾ 50¾ 54¾ 58¾ 62½ 66½ 70½ / 90 98 5 109 118 5 129 139 149 159 169 179 cm length 16¾ 16¾ 17 17½ 18 18½ 19 19½ 20¼ 21 / 42 5 42 5 43 44 5 45 5 47 48 5 49 5 51 5 53 5 cm shown in size 38¾ / 98 5cm recommended ease approximately 2 4 / 5 10 cm positive ease **yarn** berroco ultra wool fine 100grs 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 6 balls #53153 heather **needles and notions** 32 / 80 cm circular needles sizes 3 / 3 25 mm and 4 / 3 5 mm or size to obtain gauge stitch markers waste yarn to hold stitches six ½ buttons **gauge** 24 sts and 30 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st 26 sts and 30 row = 4 / 10 cm worked over charts gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge
